name: Vagrant Fury
description:
He has long lost his way... and his memory. The only thing keeping him alive? His talent for violence. Now it's time to get some answers... from the City's underworld. Where thugs and ninjas, demons and cyborgs battle for supremacy!




Vagrant Fury is many things: a 3D voxel side-shooter, a retro arcade game, a modern homage to the 80's and 90's looks, themes and sounds. But mostly, Vagrant Fury is a throwback to simpler times. Good Guy, meet Bad Guy. Bad Guy, meet Good Guy's rockect launcher. Ah, those were the days... So grab your best pair of rose-tinted glasses, and check it out!


Blowing stuff up doesn't have to blow: you'll have brand new weapons for each mission. Also: sub-bosses and main bosses with big mouths and guns to match — just what every action hero needs!




Harnessing the power of computers salvaged from our local dumpster, we're able to offer you the most advanced voxel graphics on the market today. VoxelPower™ — Because Pixel is Dead!




Vagrant Fury was handcrafted by VectorGoat Games: a small shop of hard-working humanoids, all of them with a passion for game development.



A secret past! A plot full of twists and surprises! A hero's path, tragic but inspiring! Clichés you can trust! — (Action and Sci-fi Tropes Certified)




Remember when music was good? Yeah, us too — that's why we have an awesome synthwave soundtrack! Synthwave - where cheese and greatness collide! Synthwave makes Vagrant Fury enjoyable even with the screen turned off!


From colorful level designs, to hand illustrated cutscenes, showing us that life ain't all about mega explosions and speedruns.
